title: Enable/disable xUnit1012 rule
body:
### Context
After the https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10577 is merged the new warnings of xunit analyzers were disabled. The goal is to check each warning and enable or leave as it is with explanation

https://xunit.net/xunit.analyzers/rules/xUnit1012

### Goal

The goal is to enable the warning when `null` is used for not nullable parameter. 

The pros of using this: 
- More readble test's code 
- Unified style in tests
